## Learning objectives {.unnumbered}

After reading this chapter, you should be able to:

- Apply Monte Carlo methods to approximate integrals and expectations
- Use Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) techniques for Bayesian inference
- Understand parameter uncertainty propagation in decision-making
- Implement Monte Carlo simulation for climate risk assessment

## Essential Monte Carlo concepts

1. Monte Carlo integration and expectation approximation
1. Bayesian inference and posterior sampling
1. Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods
1. Parameter uncertainty propagation
1. Sensitivity analysis and global uncertainty quantification
